dmca.title: ICM DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Recipient Information:

Google Inc.

Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

 

 

DMCA Notification 11-06-29 #1 dated June, 29 2011

 

 

1. Rights Owner(s): WEST INC.

 

2. Rights Agent: INTERNET COPYRIGHT MANAGEMENT

 

3. Infringed Rights: COPYRIGHT, TRADEMARK, PERFORMERS & MORAL RIGHTS

 

4. Infringed Movie(s): THE TREE OF LIFE (PIRATE COPIES)

 

5. Infringing Activity: COPYRIGHT / TRADEMARK FILE UPLOADING & DOWNLOADING
(MOVIE PIRACY)

 

6. Infringing URLs:

 

* in the attached file.

 

7. DMCA Request:

1) Disable links to the above URLs.
2) Discontinue returning the above URLs as results to the above search
queries.

 

* Note 1:

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials I will
submit via email and allege to be infringing are not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

* Note 2:

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information I submit in each and
every notification I will send to Google will be accurate and that I will be
at the time of notification the copyright owner or authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

CONFIDENTIAL NOTICE

This document contains information confidential and proprietary to ICM. The
information may not be used, disclosed or reproduced without the prior
written authorization of ICM.
